message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. I think it's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $12000 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down a bit to $13500 to make this deal work.  It's still a great price considering the value you'll get from this product.  Let me know if you're able to meet me halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12500?
